edu.uw.zookeeper.common

Class SimpleArguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.zookeeper.common.SimpleArguments
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Arguments, Iterable<Arguments.Option>

    public class SimpleArguments
extends Object
implements Arguments
    Simple command line argument parser. Only recognizes the format --NAME=VALUE or --NAME
